casebody.data:
IZYDORE
v.
TOKUTA, et al. No. 323P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Nov. 5, 2015. Robert C. Ekstrand, Durham, for Izydore, Robert A. Stephanie A. Brennan, Assistant Attorney General, for Tokuta, Alade, et al.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th of October 2015 by Plaintiff Conditional to Treat his Petition for Discretionary Review as a Petition for Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of November 2015."
